course_title: Functional Medicine Health Coach Certification - Complete Professional Training
subtitle: Complete Curriculum - 21 Modules (Module 0-20) + Professional Resources
target_audience: Healthcare professionals, wellness coaches, career changers (especially women 35-55+), nurses, therapists, moms, and anyone passionate about helping others reverse chronic disease through root-cause functional medicine
difficulty_description: Intermediate - Accessible to learners without medical background (we teach everything from scratch), but comprehensive clinical training for professional practice with advanced lab interpretation and protocol design
format: Video lessons + Written transcripts + Workbooks + Quizzes + Community
course_description: Transform your career with the most complete and most accredited functional medicine certification available. Master clinical skills recognized in 35+ countries and build a thriving health coaching practice with income potential of $15,000-30,000+ per month. Created by Sarah, a former ICU nurse who healed herself through functional medicine and now trains thousands of practitioners worldwide.

instructor.name: Sarah
instructor.credentials: Former ICU Nurse, Certified Functional Medicine Practitioner
instructor.story: After burning out in the ICU and healing herself through functional medicine, Sarah created this comprehensive certification to help others become the practitioners they wish they had found.

learning_outcomes: By the end of this course, learners will be able to interpret functional lab work (CBC, complete metabolic panels, lipid panels, thyroid panels, hormone panels) using functional ranges to identify patterns indicating root causes of chronic disease years before conventional ranges detect problems

Learners will confidently design personalized, evidence-based functional medicine protocols including therapeutic nutrition interventions for major conditions (thyroid dysfunction, gut issues, hormone imbalances, metabolic syndrome, autoimmune conditions, adrenal dysfunction)

Learners will apply professional coaching techniques to facilitate lasting client transformation, conduct powerful 90-minute intake sessions, use motivational interviewing and accountability systems without judgment, navigate resistance and emotional barriers, and build sustainable health practices that last

Learners will establish and market a legal, ethical functional medicine health coaching practice with proper scope of practice understanding, pricing strategies ($1,500-3,000 packages), and proven client acquisition systems (organic social media, webinars, partnerships)
accreditations: ICAHP (International Compliance Association for Holistic Practitioners)

modules.title: Orientation & Welcome
modules.description: Course navigation, community access, how to get the most from your certification journey

modules.title: Functional Medicine Foundations
modules.description: Core principles, systems biology, root-cause thinking, the functional medicine matrix and timeline
lesson_titles: What Is Functional Medicine and Why It Matters
The Power of the Patient Story
Case Studies: Seeing the Whole Picture

modules.title: Health Coaching Mastery
modules.description: Professional coaching techniques, motivational interviewing, accountability systems, client transformation
lesson_titles: The Art and Science of Health Coaching

modules.title: Clinical Assessment
modules.description: Comprehensive intake processes, health history, symptom questionnaires, clinical interview skills

modules.title: Ethics & Scope of Practice
modules.description: Legal boundaries, scope of practice, when to refer, documentation, professional ethics
lesson_titles: What Health Coaches Can and Cannot Do
When to Refer to Medical Professionals

modules.title: Functional Nutrition
modules.description: Therapeutic diets, elimination protocols, anti-inflammatory nutrition, personalized approaches
lesson_titles: Blood Sugar Balance and Glycemic Control

modules.title: Gut Health & Microbiome
modules.description: Digestive function, microbiome optimization, leaky gut, SIBO, gut-brain connection
lesson_titles: Gut Health Protocols and Case Studies

modules.title: Stress, Adrenals & Nervous System
modules.description: HPA axis, cortisol patterns, adrenal dysfunction, nervous system regulation, stress resilience

modules.title: Sleep & Circadian Health
modules.description: Sleep architecture, circadian rhythm optimization, insomnia protocols, sleep hygiene

modules.title: Women's Hormone Health
modules.description: Menstrual cycle optimization, estrogen dominance, progesterone, hormone balance strategies

modules.title: Perimenopause & Menopause
modules.description: Perimenopause transition, menopause symptoms, HRT considerations, natural approaches

modules.title: Thyroid Health
modules.description: Thyroid function, Hashimoto's, hypothyroidism, thyroid testing, thyroid support strategies

modules.title: Metabolic Health & Weight
modules.description: Insulin resistance, metabolic syndrome, weight loss resistance, metabolic flexibility

modules.title: Autoimmunity & Inflammation
modules.description: Autoimmune mechanisms, chronic inflammation, immune modulation, autoimmune protocols

modules.title: Mental Health & Brain Function
modules.description: Neurotransmitters, brain health, mood disorders, cognitive function, brain-body connection

modules.title: Cardiometabolic Health
modules.description: Cardiovascular risk, lipid panels, blood pressure, heart health optimization

modules.title: Energy & Mitochondrial Health
modules.description: Mitochondrial function, cellular energy, fatigue root causes, energy optimization

modules.title: Detox & Environmental Health
modules.description: Liver detoxification pathways, environmental toxins, safe detox protocols

modules.title: Functional Lab Interpretation
modules.description: Reading lab work, functional vs conventional ranges, pattern recognition, lab-based protocols

modules.title: Protocol Building & Program Design
modules.description: Creating personalized protocols, supplement recommendations, program structure

modules.title: Building Your Coaching Practice
modules.description: Business setup, pricing, marketing, client attraction, building a sustainable practice

included_resources: Client intake forms and comprehensive health assessment questionnaires (5+ forms)
Lab interpretation guides and functional ranges reference charts (10+ guides)
Treatment protocol templates for all major conditions (8+ protocols)
Meal plans and recipe guides (3+ comprehensive meal plans)
Supplement protocol guides with dosing recommendations (5+ guides)
Business launch materials: pricing, packages, terms of service templates
Marketing templates and social media content (20+ templates)
Client education handouts for all major topics (15+ handouts)
Conversation scripts and powerful question frameworks (5+ scripts)
Stress and Resilience Assessment (PSS-10 and resilience factors)
certificates: Module Completion Certificates (earned after each module)
Foundation Certificate - Understanding Functional Medicine Principles (Module 1)
Clinical Skills Certificate - Lab Interpretation Competency (Module 18)
Final Certification: Functional Medicine Health Coach Practitioner
bonus_features: Monthly Live Q&A Calls with Sarah
Monthly Bonus Trainings (new research and protocols)
What's New in Functional Medicine Newsletter
Client Gift Ideas and Milestone Celebration Guide
Supplement discount codes and wholesale access
platform_features: Lifetime access - learn at your own pace, return anytime
Mobile-friendly platform - learn on phone, tablet, or computer
Searchable resource library organized by category
Video speed control and closed captions

recommended_completion.flexibility: Lifetime access allows you to go faster or slower based on your schedule

ideal_student.primary_demographic: Women aged 35-55+ (but all ages and genders welcome)
ideal_student.no_prerequisites: No medical background required - we teach everything from scratch with simple explanations, metaphors, and diagrams
backgrounds: Nurses looking to transition out of traditional healthcare
Moms who healed themselves and want to help others
Therapists adding functional medicine to their practice
Anyone who experienced the broken healthcare system firsthand
ideal_student.mindset: Ready to invest in themselves and committed to helping others heal

student_success_metrics.completion_rate: Higher than industry average due to lifetime access and community support
student_success_metrics.student_satisfaction: Thousands of graduates building successful practices
common_outcomes: Healed their own chronic conditions while learning

platform.constraints: Inline HTML only, no external CSS/JS
